public ref class Matrix sealed : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable
type Matrix = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IDisposable

summary.span: 封装表示几何变换的 3x3 仿射矩阵。

span.span: Encapsulates a 3-by-3 affine matrix that represents a geometric transform.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]中, 可以在对象中存储仿射转换。In [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] you can store an affine transformation in a object. 由于表示仿射转换的矩阵的第三列总是 (0, 0, 1), 因此, 在构造对象时, 只应在前两列中指定六个数字。Because the third column of a matrix that represents an affine transformation is always (0, 0, 1), you specify only the six numbers in the first two columns when you construct a object. 语句`Matrix myMatrix = new Matrix(0, 1, -1, 0, 3, 4)`构造如下图所示的矩阵。The statement `Matrix myMatrix = new Matrix(0, 1, -1, 0, 3, 4)` constructs the matrix shown in the following figure. ![转换](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art10.gif "转换")![Transformations](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art10.gif "Transformations") ## 复合转换Composite Transformations 复合转换是一系列转换, 一个后跟另一个。A composite transformation is a sequence of transformations, one followed by the other. 请考虑以下列表中的矩阵和转换:Consider the matrices and transformations in the following list: ||| |-|-| |矩阵 AMatrix A|旋转90度Rotate 90 degrees| |矩阵 BMatrix B|在 x 方向上按系数2缩放Scale by a factor of 2 in the x direction| |Matrix CMatrix C|在 y 方向上转换3个单位Translate 3 units in the y direction| 如果我们从由矩阵 [2 1 1] 表示的点 (2, 1) 开始, 然后再乘以 A、B、C, 则点 (2, 1) 将按列出的顺序进行三次转换。If we start with the point (2, 1) - represented by the matrix [2 1 1] - and multiply by A, then B, then C, the point (2, 1) will undergo the three transformations in the order listed. [2 1 1]ABC = [-2 5 1][2 1 1]ABC = [-2 5 1] 不是将复合转换的三个部分存储在三个单独的矩阵中, 而是可以将 A、B 和 C 相乘, 以获取存储整个复合转换的单个3×3矩阵。Rather than store the three parts of the composite transformation in three separate matrices, you can multiply A, B, and C together to get a single 3×3 matrix that stores the entire composite transformation. 假设 ABC = D。然后, 将一个点乘以 D, 就会得到与点相乘的结果, 然后再乘以 B, 然后按 C。Suppose ABC = D. Then a point multiplied by D gives the same result as a point multiplied by A, then B, then C. [2 1 1]D = [-2 5 1][2 1 1]D = [-2 5 1] 下图显示了矩阵 A、B、C 和 D。The following illustration shows the matrices A, B, C, and D. ![转换](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art12.gif "转换")![Transformations](~/add/media/aboutgdip05-art12.gif "Transformations") 复合转换的矩阵可以通过乘以单个变换矩阵来形成, 这意味着任何一系列仿射转换都可以存储在单个对象中。The fact that the matrix of a composite transformation can be formed by multiplying the individual transformation matrices means that any sequence of affine transformations can be stored in a single object. > [!CAUTION] > 复合转换的顺序很重要。The order of a composite transformation is important. 通常, 旋转, 然后缩放, 然后平移与缩放、旋转和平移不同。In general, rotate, then scale, then translate is not the same as scale, then rotate, then translate. 同样, 矩阵相乘的顺序也非常重要。Similarly, the order of matrix multiplication is important. 通常, ABC 不同于背景。In general, ABC is not the same as BAC. 类提供若干用于生成复合转换的方法: 、、、、和。 The class provides several methods for building a composite transformation: , , , , , and . 下面的示例创建一个复合变换矩阵, 该矩阵首先旋转30度, 然后在 y 方向上按系数2缩放, 然后在 x 方向平移5个单位:The following example creates the matrix of a composite transformation that first rotates 30 degrees, then scales by a factor of 2 in the y direction, and then translates 5 units in the x direction: [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.CoordinateSystems#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CoordinateSystems/CS/Class1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.CoordinateSystems#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.CoordinateSystems/VB/Class1.vb#11)]

span.span: Coordinate Systems and Transformations

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Drawing.Rectangle rect, valuetype System.Drawing.Point[] plgpts) cil managed
Public Sub New (rect As Rectangle, plgpts As Point())

param.name: rect
param.span: 表示将变换的矩形的 结构。

span.span: A structure that represents the rectangle to be transformed.

param.name: plgpts
param.span: 一个由三个 结构构成的数组，该数组表示矩形的左上角、右上角和左下角将变换为的平行四边形的三个点。

span.span: An array of three structures that represents the points of a parallelogram to which the upper-left, upper-right, and lower-left corners of the rectangle is to be transformed.

param.span: 平行四边形的右下角的位置可从前三个角的位置导出。

span.span: The lower-right corner of the parallelogram is implied by the first three corners.

summary.span: 将 类的一个新实例初始化为指定矩形和点数组定义的几何变换。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class to the geometric transform defined by the specified rectangle and array of points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法初始化新矩阵, 以使其表示几何转换, 该转换将由`rect`参数指定的矩形映射到`plgpts`参数中由三个点定义的平行四边形。This method initializes the new Matrix such that it represents the geometric transform that maps the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter to the parallelogram defined by the three points in the `plgpts` parameter. 矩形的左上角映射到`plgpts`数组中的第一个点, 右上角映射到第二个点, 左下角映射到第三个点。The upper-left corner of the rectangle is mapped to the first point in the `plgpts` array, the upper-right corner is mapped to the second point, and the lower-left corner is mapped to the third point. 平行四边形的右下点是前三个。The lower-right point of the parallelogram is implied by the first three.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会初始化新的, 以使其表示几何转换, 该转换将`rect`由参数指定的矩形映射到由`plgpts`参数中的三个点定义的平行四边形。This method initializes the new such that it represents the geometric transform that maps the rectangle specified by the `rect` parameter to the parallelogram defined by the three points in the `plgpts` parameter. 矩形的左上角映射到`plgpts`数组中的第一个点, 右上角映射到第二个点, 左下角映射到第三个点。The upper-left corner of the rectangle is mapped to the first point in the `plgpts` array, the upper-right corner is mapped to the second point, and the lower-left corner is mapped to the third point. 平行四边形的右下点是前三个。The lower-right point of the parallelogram is implied by the first three.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的顺序为 , 则将用预置顺序乘以指定矩阵。If the specified order is , this is multiplied by the specified matrix in a prepended order. 如果指定的顺序为, 则将此与追加的顺序中指定的矩阵相乘。If the specified order is , this is multiplied by the specified matrix in an appended order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`一个事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建三个矩阵。Creates three matrices. - 列出矩阵1到屏幕的内容。Lists the contents of matrix 1 to the screen. - 将矩阵1乘以矩阵 2, 并将结果存储在矩阵1中。Multiplies matrix 1 by matrix 2 and stores the result in matrix 1. - 列出矩阵1到屏幕的内容。Lists the contents of matrix 1 to the screen. - 将矩阵2中存储的结果与矩阵3相乘, 并再次将结果存储在矩阵1中。Multiplies the result stored in matrix 1 by matrix 3, and again stores the result in matrix 1. - 列出矩阵1到屏幕的内容。Lists the contents of matrix 1 to the screen. - 在应用矩阵1转换 (蓝色矩形) 之前, 在屏幕上绘制矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying the matrix 1 transform (the blue rectangle). - 将转换应用到矩形。Applies the transform to the rectangle. - 使用与上一个矩形相同的坐标, 将转换后的矩形绘制到屏幕 (红色矩形)。Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle), using the same coordinates as the previous rectangle. 请注意, 红色矩形已通过水平方向上的两个因子进行了调整, 然后旋转了90度, 然后在 x 50 方向上移动 (平移) 250 点, 在 y 方向上移动 (平移) 点。Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of two in the horizontal direction, then rotated 90 degrees, and then moved (translated) 250 points in the x direction and 50 points in the y direction. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Reset() cil managed

summary.span: 重置此 得到单位矩阵的元素。

span.span: Resets this to have the elements of the identity matrix.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 恒等矩阵的主对角线上的元素是1。The elements on the main diagonal of the identity matrix are 1. 标识矩阵的所有其他元素均为0。All other elements of the identity matrix are 0. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`一个事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建缩放矩阵。Creates a scaling matrix. - 在屏幕上列出矩阵元素。Lists the matrix elements to the screen. - 将矩阵重置为标识。Resets the matrix to identity. - 列出屏幕上的元素。Lists the elements to the screen. - 在 x 轴上将矩阵平移50点, 在 y 轴上转换40点。Translates the matrix by 50 points in the x-axis and 40 points in the y-axis. - 列出翻译后的矩阵在屏幕上的元素。Lists the elements of the translated matrix to the screen. - 在应用矩阵变换 (蓝色矩形) 之前, 绘制一个矩形到屏幕上。Draws a rectangle is drawn to the screen prior to applying the matrix transform (the blue rectangle). - 将转换应用到矩形。Applies the transform to the rectangle. - 使用与上一个矩形相同的坐标绘制已转换的矩形 (红色矩形)。Draws the transformed rectangle is drawn to the screen (the red rectangle), using the same coordinates as the previous rectangle. 请注意, 红色矩形不会缩放 (因为重置), 而是在 x 轴和 y 轴上转换。Notice that the red rectangle was not scaled (because of the reset) but was translated in the x-axis and y-axis. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 对此 沿原点顺时针旋转指定角度。

span.span: Applies a clockwise rotation of the specified angle about the origin to this .

span.span: Applies a clockwise rotation of an amount specified in the parameter, around the origin (zero x and y coordinates) for this .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`一个事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 在应用旋转变换 (蓝色矩形) 之前向屏幕绘制一个矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a rotation transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵并将其旋转45度。Creates a matrix and rotates it 45 degrees. - 将此矩阵转换应用到矩形。Applies this matrix transform to the rectangle. - 将已转换的矩形绘制到屏幕 (红色矩形)。Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意, 红色矩形已围绕 0, 0 屏幕坐标旋转。Notice that the red rectangle has been rotated around the 0, 0 screen coordinates. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 通过预先计算旋转，沿指定点顺时针旋转该 。

span.span: Applies a clockwise rotation about the specified point to this by prepending the rotation.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`一个事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 在应用旋转变换 (蓝色矩形) 之前向屏幕绘制一个矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a rotation transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵并围绕指定点旋转45度。Creates a matrix and rotates it 45 degrees around a specified point. - 将此矩阵转换应用到矩形。Applies this matrix transform is to the rectangle. - 将已转换的矩形绘制到屏幕 (红色矩形)。Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意, 红色矩形已围绕矩形的左上角旋转 (旋转点指定了方法)。Notice that the red rectangle has been rotated around the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the rotation point specified the method). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`一个事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 在应用缩放变换之前向屏幕绘制一个矩形 (蓝色矩形)。Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a scaling transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵并在 x 轴中将它缩放3个, 并在 y 轴中缩放2。Creates a matrix and scales it by 3 in the x-axis and 2 in the y-axis. - 将此矩阵转换应用到矩形。Applies this matrix transform to the rectangle. - 将已转换的矩形绘制到屏幕 (红色矩形)。Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意, 红色矩形已按照 x 轴中的3倍和 y 轴中的2进行缩放, 其中包括矩形的左上角 (矩形的起点)。Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of 3 in the x-axis and by 2 in the y-axis, including the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the beginning point of the rectangle). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

summary.span: 通过预先计算切变向量将指定的切变向量应用到此 。

span.span: Applies the specified shear vector to this by prepending the shear vector.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Shear (float shearX, float shearY);
.method public hidebysig instance void Shear(float32 shearX, float32 shearY) cil managed
Public Sub Shear (shearX As Single, shearY As Single)
public: void Shear(float shearX, float shearY);

param.name: shearX
param.span: 水平切变因子。

span.span: The horizontal shear factor.

param.name: shearY
param.span: 垂直切变因子。

span.span: The vertical shear factor.

summary.span: 通过预先计算切变变换，将指定的切变向量应用到此 。

span.span: Applies the specified shear vector to this by prepending the shear transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当其中一个参数为0时, 才使用此方法中应用的转换。The transformation applied in this method is a pure shear only if one of the parameters is 0. 应用于原点的矩形, 当`shearY`系数为0时, 转换会将下边缘`shearX`水平移动矩形的高度。Applied to a rectangle at the origin, when the `shearY` factor is 0, the transformation moves the bottom edge horizontally by `shearX` times the height of the rectangle. 当系数为0时, 它会将该矩形的宽度`shearY`垂直向右移动。 `shearX`When the `shearX` factor is 0, it moves the right edge vertically by `shearY` times the width of the rectangle. 当两个参数都不为零时, 因为结果很难预测, 所以需要小心。Caution is in order when both parameters are nonzero, because the results are hard to predict. 例如, 如果两个因素都为 1, 则转换为单数 (因此 noninvertible), 将整个平面挤压为一个直线。For example, if both factors are 1, the transformation is singular (hence noninvertible), squeezing the entire plane to a single line. ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`一个事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 此代码执行以下操作:The code performs the following action: - 在应用缩放变换之前, 使用绿色钢笔在屏幕上绘制矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen, using a green pen, prior to applying a scaling transform. - 创建, 并使用它来设置的世界坐标变换。 Creates a and uses it to set a world-coordinate transform for the . - 使用红色钢笔绘制另一个矩形。Draws another rectangle using a red pen. - 使用蓝色笔绘制椭圆。Draws an ellipse using a blue pen. 结果为绿色矩形、红色平行四边形和变换后的蓝色椭圆。The result is a green rectangle, a red parallelogram and a transformed, blue ellipse. 请注意, 在设置转换之前绘制的绿色矩形会直接使用在调用中提供的坐标。Notice that the green rectangle (drawn prior to setting the transform) directly uses the coordinates supplied in the call. 在绘制之前, 将转换其他两个数字。The other two figures are transformed prior to drawing. 矩形转换为平行四边形 (红色), 椭圆 (蓝色) 转换为适合变换后的平行四边形。The rectangle is transformed to a parallelogram (red), and the ellipse (blue) is transformed to fit into the transformed parallelogram. 请注意, 矩形的底部在 x 轴上移动 (切变) 的是矩形高度的两倍, 从而形成平行四边形。Notice the bottom of the rectangle is moved (sheared) in the x-axis by a factor of two times the height of the rectangle, thus forming the parallelogram. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

span.span: Applies the specified shear vector to this in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当其中一个参数为0时, 才使用此方法中应用的转换。The transformation applied in this method is a pure shear only if one of the parameters is 0. 应用于原点的矩形, 当`shearY`系数为0时, 转换会将下边缘`shearX`水平移动矩形的高度。Applied to a rectangle at the origin, when the `shearY` factor is 0, the transformation moves the bottom edge horizontally by `shearX` times the height of the rectangle. 当系数为0时, 它会将该矩形的宽度`shearY`垂直向右移动。 `shearX`When the `shearX` factor is 0, it moves the right edge vertically by `shearY` times the width of the rectangle. 当两个参数都不为零时, 因为结果很难预测, 所以需要小心。Caution is in order when both parameters are nonzero, because the results are hard to predict. 例如, 如果两个因素都为 1, 则转换为单数 (因此 noninvertible), 将整个平面挤压为一个直线。For example, if both factors are 1, the transformation is singular (hence noninvertible), squeezing the entire plane to a single line. ## Examples 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`一个事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建构成矩形的点的数组。Creates an array of points that form a rectangle. - 绘制此点数组 (在应用缩放变换之前到屏幕 (蓝色矩形)。Draws this array of points (to the screen prior to applying a scaling transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵并在 x 轴中将它缩放3个, 并在 y 轴中缩放2。Creates a matrix and scales it by 3 in the x-axis and 2 in the y-axis. - 将此矩阵转换应用到点数组。Applies this matrix transform to the array of points. - 将变换后的数组绘制到屏幕 (红色矩形)。Draws the transformed array to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意, 红色矩形已按照 x 轴中的3倍和 y 轴中的2进行缩放, 其中包括矩形的左上角 (矩形的起点)。Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of 3 in the x-axis and by 2 in the y-axis, including the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the beginning point of the rectangle). [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`一个事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建构成矩形的点的数组。Creates an array of points that form a rectangle. - 在应用缩放变换 (蓝色矩形) 之前, 将此点数组绘制到屏幕。Draws this array of points to the screen prior to applying a scaling transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵并在 x 轴中将其缩放 3, 在 y 轴中将其缩放 2, 并在两个轴将其转换为100。Creates a matrix and scales it by 3 in the x-axis and 2 in the y-axis, and translates it by 100 in both axes. - 在屏幕上列出矩阵元素。Lists the matrix elements to the screen. - 将此矩阵转换应用到点数组。Applies this matrix transform to the array of points. - 将变换后的数组绘制到屏幕 (红色矩形)。Draws the transformed array to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意, 红色矩形已按照 x 轴中的3倍和 y 轴中的2进行缩放, 其中包括矩形的左上角 (矩形的起点), 但转换向量 (矩阵的最后两个元素) 将被忽略。Notice that the red rectangle has been scaled by a factor of 3 in the x-axis and by 2 in the y-axis, including the upper left-hand corner of the rectangle (the beginning point of the rectangle) but the translation vector (the last two elements of the matrix) is ignored. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#8)]

span.span: Applies the specified translation vector to this in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用, 并且它需要 `e`一个事件对象。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 在应用转换转换 (蓝色矩形) 之前, 在屏幕上绘制矩形。Draws a rectangle to the screen prior to applying a translate transform (the blue rectangle). - 创建一个矩阵并在两个轴中将其转换为100。Creates a matrix and translates it by 100 in both axes. - 将此矩阵转换应用到矩形,Applies this matrix transform to the rectangle, - 将已转换的矩形绘制到屏幕 (红色矩形)。Draws the transformed rectangle to the screen (the red rectangle). 请注意, 红色矩形的开头位于蓝色三角形开头的两个轴中的100点。Notice that the beginning of the red rectangle is located 100 points in both axes from the beginning of the blue triangle. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMatrixExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void VectorTransformPoints(valuetype System.Drawing.Point[] pts) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: pts
param.span: 一个 结构的数组，它表示要变换的点。

span.span: An array of structures that represents the points to transform.

summary.span: 将数组中的每个矢量与矩阵相乘。

span.span: Multiplies each vector in an array by the matrix.

summary.span: 该矩阵的转换元素（第三行）被忽略。

span.span: The translation elements of this matrix (third row) are ignored.
